mapper.sql: parts_id, parts_code, parts_name, parts_model, parts_unit, parts_spec, parts_brand_id, parts_factory, origin, shelf_life, price, discount, cur_price, remark, is_usable, parts_type_id, create_time, dml_time
mapper.update: UPDATE hqls_parts SET parts_code = #{partsCode}, parts_name = #{partsName}, parts_model = #{partsModel}, parts_unit = #{partsUnit}, parts_spec = #{partsSpec}, parts_brand_id = #{partsBrandId}, parts_factory = #{partsFactory}, origin = #{origin}, shelf_life = #{shelfLife}, price = #{price}, discount = #{discount}, cur_price = #{curPrice}, remark = #{remark}, is_usable = #{isUsable}, parts_type_id = #{partsTypeId}, create_time = #{createTime}, dml_time = #{dmlTime} WHERE parts_id = #{partsId}
mapper.select: select pa.parts_id,pa.parts_name,pa.parts_code, pa.parts_model,pa.parts_unit,pa.parts_spec, pa.parts_factory,pa.origin,pa.shelf_life, pa.price,pa.discount,pa.cur_price, hpt.type_name as p_name,hpt.pid,hpt.parts_type as parts_top_type_id, case when hpt.parts_type=1 then '易损件' when hpt.parts_type=2 then '车型件' else '标志数字不存在' end as parts_top_type from hqls_parts pa inner join hqls_parts_type hpt on hpt.parts_type_id=pa.parts_type_id where 1=1 and pa.parts_code like CONCAT('%',#{partsCode},'%') and pa.parts_name like CONCAT('%',#{partsName},'%') and hpt.parts_type=#{partsTopTypeId} and hpt.pid=#{pid} and pa.parts_id=#{partsId}
